attributes.action: treat the citizens of Northern Ireland with equally in respect to the Home Energy Saving Programme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The citizens of Northern Ireland are severly disinfranchised in regard to the lack of equally afforded to them with the recent announcement of the Home Energy Saving Programme that appears to exclude same from benefiting from much needed assistance.
We seek clarification on this matter with an expectation of equality and equity for all.
